features.name: Authentication System
features.description: User authentication with email/password, profile management, role-based access control, and session management

features.name: Dashboard System
features.description: Main user dashboard with widgets for XP progress, daily rituals, coherence, achievements, current lesson, constellation navigator, teacher feed, and quick actions

features.name: Course Management System
features.description: Course catalog browsing, course details, video lesson playback, progress tracking, enrollment, and course creation for teachers

features.name: Mastery System
features.description: Habit tracking, toolbox items management, and calendar integration for mastery progression

features.name: Stellar Map System
features.description: Interactive 2D and 3D stellar map visualization for learning content navigation with node grouping, XP-based visibility, and YouTube video integration

features.name: Social and Community Features
features.description: Social feed with post creation, commenting, and liking functionality

features.name: Profile Management
features.description: User profile settings, avatar customization, personal information management, and progress visualization

features.name: Skills and Achievements System
features.description: Skills progress tracking across cognitive, creative, discipline, and social categories, and achievements/badges display

features.name: XP and Leveling System
features.description: XP progression system with 51 levels across 4 schools (Ignition, Insight, Transformation, God Mode)

features.name: Payment and Subscription System
features.description: Stripe integration for subscription management and payment processing

features.name: Navigation and Layout
features.description: Application shell with navigation, mobile responsiveness, and layout management

features.name: UI Components Library
features.description: Reusable UI components built with Radix UI and Tailwind CSS

features.name: Color Palette System
features.description: Dynamic color palette switching and theme management

features.name: Common Utilities
features.description: Shared utilities for error handling, logging, memoization, and common functions

features.name: Timer System
features.description: Timer functionality for tracking study sessions and activities
